# firehydrant_signals_api_escalation_policy (Data Source)

SignalsAPIEscalationPolicy DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "firehydrant_signals_api_escalation_policy" "my_signals_api_escalationpolicy" {
  id      = "...my_id..."
  team_id = "...my_team_id..."
}
```
